description:
To learn about their enemy, Seiya and his friends head out to see the masters who trained them. But in Greece, a vengeful Shaina awaits Seiya.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Honki de Tatakae! Shaina no Gyakushuu
La trahison du Seigneur des Glaces
¡Lucha de verdad! El contraataque de Shaina
本気で戦え! シャイナの逆襲
